member.summary: Gets the user's QQ profile picture URL (50px*50px).

member.summary: Gets the user's QQ profile picture URL (100px*100px).

member.summary: Gets the user's QQ avatar URL (40px*40px).

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.QQ.QQHelper.GetAvatarFull(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.summary: Gets the user's QQ space avatar URL (100px*100px).

member.name: F:AspNet.Security.OAuth.Salesforce.SalesforceAuthenticationEnvironment.Production

member.name: F:AspNet.Security.OAuth.Salesforce.SalesforceAuthenticationEnvironment.Test
member.summary: Uses test.salesforce.com in the OAuth2 endpoints.
